Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the foundational systems requirements and brainstorm initial ideas for input handling and basic physics.
Set up the project structure in Unity, create necessary folders (Scripts, Assets, Scenes, Prefabs). Initialize Git repository and set up version control with @beng-1 for collaboration.
Start implementing basic input handling system (keyboard/mouse controls). Test basic movement and camera controls.
Continue refining input handling system. Debug any issues with @cdev-1 and @cdev-2.
Begin drafting basic physics system (gravity, collision detection). Research Unity's physics engine for reference.
Wrap up the day's work, commit changes to Git, and update task progress in the project management tool.
